text: With a large blond youth of quite dazzling dumbness called Troy Donahue; and Claudette Colbert, still charming amid the nonsense, and Karl Malden not knowing how to take it, all rolling eyeballs like a villain from East Lynne.
handwritten_text: With a large blond youth of quite dazzling dumbness called Troy Donahue; and Claudette Colbert, still charming amid the nonsense, and Karl Malden not knowing how to take it, all rolling eyeballs like a villain from East Lynne.
